channel.title: Makeing new server need Coders client makers etc more info inside!
channel.description:
[center]Im makeing a cool new pk/normal server Im gonna need
[s]5[/s] [color=red]4[/color] coders Current:viruz 3
3 code error correctors
4 Client Makers
2 idea makers
2 people that know how to add items into the game
And
2 foremen that tell me the progrees of everything and can keep people spirits up
If You Apply You are attomaticaly gonna either Be Admin Mod Co-owner or council members A.K.A. the ppl who give ideas for new admins mods and keep the People Informed on Updates
Heres the Application!
Name/nickname/ingamename:
Age:
Which Job You are Applying for/Why:
Do you Know Java Good-Medium-Bad:
Contact (email Aim msn etc. names):
(only for client makers)How Many Clients u made and for which servers:
(only For Client Makers)How Good Are you at client makeing:
(only for Foremen)Do you have any expieriance with athoraty:
(only for Foremen)Can You Keep peoples Spirits up:
(only for Coders)How Good Can you Code:
(only for Coders)For How many servers have you coded for:
(only For Code Error Correctors)Are You Very good for correcting errors in Coding:
(only For Item adders)Do you know how to add boxes anvils coins alters npcs etc.:
(only For Idea Makers)Are You Good At makeing Ideas:
Yes You Can Apply For more than 1
I will Soon Make A wicked forum.[/center][br][hr]So Post Your Apps now! :D
